trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Shelby
There were no other sightings in Shelby on or around April 10th 2012
Summary: The thing is following me to work
divs: Sighting DetailsI have seen this same object for the past several months but I have not reported it. It looks like a really bright star, but it is not a star. The object moves around and then comes back. It is a really bright silver un-like anything I have ever seen before. I think whatever it is, is following me to work and staying there until I leave. I have been taken by beings back in Sept-2006. I have already filed a report with Mufon. I do not feel afraid! I am just making a report so if they do attempt to take me again, this will be on record.
